name: MaZester
description:
This is a procedural maze that has to be solved by the player.  The player will be spawned at the lowermost region of the maze and has to find his way to the top. There are may obstacles present along the way that needs to be avoided.

The main features are:

  • Interactive levels with enemy AI bots.
  • Random maze that makes replaying of the same levels interesting.
  • Difficult gameplay to make the game more challenging.
  • Unpredictable maze generation.

*Please note: 

  • This game is still in development and contains many bugs. 
  • The tutorials  are not added yet and will be included in further updates. 
  • We would very much like to hear from you about your thoughts and ideas on how to further improve this game.
Future Updates:
  • Improvements in gameplay experience,
  • Better optimization,
  • Tutorials will be made available,
  • Better levels,
  • and more.
Updates:

[v0.2]

  • Linux support,
  • Graphics and Audio settings added  (Will be improved in future updates).

[v0.1]

  • Windows support,
  • First release ( Early Access ).
